name: Premium Web Hosting
tagline: Fast, reliable, secure hosting for your business
description:
Our premium hosting package includes everything you need to run a professional website. With 99.9% uptime guarantee, automatic backups, and 24/7 support, you can focus on your business while we handle the technical details.

Perfect for small businesses, portfolios, and e-commerce sites.
features:
- 50GB SSD Storage
- Unlimited bandwidth
- Free SSL certificate
- Daily automatic backups
- 24/7 email support
- One-click WordPress install
- 99.9% uptime guarantee
